org.youscope.common.measurement.microplate

Class MicroplateConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.common.measurement.microplate.MicroplateConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Configuration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MicroplatePositionConfiguration

    public class MicroplateConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable, Configuration
    Configuration of structural properties of a microplate, like number and sizes of wells.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MicroplateConfiguration()
      Default constructor.
      MicroplateConfiguration(int numPositions)
      Constructor for a microplate type, when no microplate is used, but the functionality of the microplate measurement methods should be used for custom positions.
      MicroplateConfiguration(int numWellsX, int numWellsY, double wellWidth, double wellHeight)
      Constructor for a custom defined microplate.
      MicroplateConfiguration(Microplate microplateType)
      Constructor for a predefined microplate type.

        Default constructor. Initializes a 96 well plate.

                               int numWellsY,
                               double wellWidth,
                               double wellHeight)
        Constructor for a custom defined microplate.
        Parameters:
        numWellsX - number of wells in the horizontal direction.
        numWellsY - number of wells in the vertical direction.
        wellWidth - width of a well (well-well distance).
        wellHeight - height of a well (well-well distance).

      • MicroplateConfiguration

        public MicroplateConfiguration(int numPositions)
        Constructor for a microplate type, when no microplate is used, but the functionality of the microplate measurement methods should be used for custom positions.
        Parameters:
        numPositions - Number of positions.

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeIdentifier

        public java.lang.String getTypeIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Returns a unique identifier for this configuration type. The identifier is used to determine factories and addons to construct and configure jobs, measurements, etc., given a corresponding configuration. Make sure that the ID returned is unique. The returned identifier should conform to "XXX.YYY", where XXX stands for an identifier of the organizational unit or the person who created the configuration (e.g. ETH, Smith, Cindarella), and YYY stands for an identifier of the specific kind of configuration (e.g. AutofocusJob, PlatePosition, MicroplateMeasurement). Optionally, additional hierarchy levels can be defined by additional separators ., e.g. "YouScope.AutofocusJob.Version1.1" The identifier should not contain spaces, non-ASCII characters, or colons (except for hierarchy level separation). Identifiers should start with a capital character, i.e. A-Z. Make sure to not use the same identifier for different configurations, since this might result in unexpected behavior or errors. Make
        Specified by:
        getTypeIdentifier in interface Configuration
        Returns:
        Unique identifier of the configuration type.

      • isAliasMicroplate

        public boolean isAliasMicroplate()
        Microplate measurements can be "misused" to measure just some arbitrary positions (see setNumPositions()). If this is true, this function returns TRUE.
        Returns:
        TRUE, if this is not really a microplate.

      • setNumPositions

        public boolean setNumPositions(int numPositions)
        Microplate measurements can be "misused" to measure just some arbitrary positions. Call this function to define the number of positions. Automatically sets isAliasMicroplate() to true.
        Parameters:
        numPositions - The number of abitrary positions to measure.
        Returns:
        Returns TRUE if microplate dimensions changed.

      • getNumPositions

        public int getNumPositions()
        Microplate measurements can be "misused" to measure just some arbitrary positions. If isAliasMicroplate() is true, than this function returns the number of positions, otherwise it returns the x-dimension of the microplate.
        Returns:
        The number of abitrary positions to measure.

        public int getNumWellsX()

        the Horizontal well number.

      • setMicroplateDimensions

        public boolean setMicroplateDimensions(int numWellsX,
                                       int numWellsY,
                                       double wellWidth,
                                       double wellHeight,
                                       int wellPositionsX,
                                       int wellPositionsY,
                                       double wellMarginX,
                                       double wellMarginY)
        Sets the dimensions of the microplate and the measured positions.
        Parameters:
        numWellsX - Number of wells in the x-direction.
        numWellsY - Number of wells in the y-direction.
        wellWidth - Width of a well.
        wellHeight - Height of a well.
        wellPositionsX - Number of measured positions in one well in the x-direction.
        wellPositionsY - Number of measured positions in one well in the y-direction.
        wellMarginX - Relative margin between the well border and the first measured position in the x-direction.
        wellMarginY - Relative margin between the well border and the first measured position in the y-direction.
        Returns:
        Returns TRUE if microplate dimensions changed.

      • setMicroplateType

        public boolean setMicroplateType(Microplate microplateType)
        Sets the type of the microplate. If the type is not NULL, the number of wells in each direction as well as their dimensions are also set.
        Parameters:
        microplateType - the type of microplate.
        Returns:
        Returns TRUE if microplate dimensions changed.

      • setWellMarginX

        public boolean setWellMarginX(double wellMarginX)
        Sets the margin in each well between the well-border and the first measured point. The value is relative (e.g. in percent) to the well width.
        Parameters:
        wellMarginX - margin in the x-direction
        Returns:
        Returns TRUE if microplate dimensions changed.

      • getWellMarginX

      • checkConfiguration

        public void checkConfiguration()
                        throws ConfigurationException
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Checks the current state of the configuration. If the configuration state is valid, the method returns normally. If not, a ConfigurationException is thrown describing the error, and what has to be changed in the configuration, by the user, such that it becomes valid. This error can then e.g. be displayed to the user (see ConfigurationAddonTools.displayConfigurationInvalid(ConfigurationException, YouScopeClient).
        Specified by:
        checkConfiguration in interface Configuration
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
